ygData.subject: Re: bronze weapons
ygData.msgSnippet: speaking of wisps....are these creatures found in Commonlands?  and are they not the ones that hold the coveted gems that we so often seek?  i ve not seen one
ygData.messageBody:
speaking of wisps....are these creatures found in Commonlands? and are
they not the ones that hold the coveted gems that we so often seek? i've
not seen one in a long time, but last time I did, they /con red to
me....I've since gained a few levels, though...what level are they?




From: "Miller, Keith A." <keithm@...> on 04/21/99 01:05 PM PDT

To: eqenchanters@onelist.com@SMTP@Exchange
cc:
Subject: [eqenchanters] Re: bronze weapons

From: "Miller, Keith A." <keithm@...>

Easy to say until you need to fire off a 50 mana spell and only have 45
mana ;) Plus getting the staff is half the fun. Its not that much
harder than most places where you find bronze weapons. Plus being magic
it helps in the ever popular past time of wisp harvesting.


-----Original Message-----
From: Magik [mailto:aarongb@...]
Sent: Wednesday, April 21, 1999 2:56 PM
To: eqenchanters@onelist.com
Subject: [eqenchanters] Re: bronze weapons


From: "Magik" <aarongb@...>

the steel staff is the same stats as the Runed Totem staff .......its
easier
to get.....it ISNT magic which sux.....but you also can buy it and you
dont
have to risk your life to get one......plus what the hell dus 5
hitpoints do
for you when you fighting things that hit for 25 each time they hit
you......?.....and what dus 5 mana points do for you when you have
400?......hehe kinda silly I think.....same as those stupid totems that
ppl
find....Ive had all of the totems I can handle and they
suck!!!!......imn my
opinon they are worth more selling them for the platinum then to hold
onto
them.....


Neurosiz
